'''Waveriding Adventurer (I)''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Fontaine: Dance of the Dew-White Springs (I)]]''. The achievements are earned by completing Open World [[Time Trial Challenge]]s in the [[Court of Fontaine]] Region, [[Belleau]] Region, and [[Beryl]] Region.
